author: Elizabeth Lopatto
title: Can Meg Whitman outwit a pandemic with Quibi?
description: Quibi was a bold idea well before the pandemic. Not only did Meg Whitman have to figure out how to tell people what it was, but she had to get them to use it. To do that, a lot of money and star power have been funneled through the company. Now, Quibi is laun…
content:
Not much is going as planned for Meg Whitman. For instance, theres a pandemic on.
When I first spoke to her for this profile in December, the new coronavirus had emerged in Wuhan already, but no one in the US was yet the wiser. In January, when Whitman gave … [+24834 chars]
